content.rendered:
Directed by Imtiaz Ali.

Written by Imtiaz Ali.

Cast Deepika Padukone(Tara Maheshwari). Ranbir Kapoor(Ved Vardhan Sahni). Piyush Mishra(Storyteller). Arushi Sharma(Sanyukta). Sushma Seth(Ved’s grandmother).Ishwak Singh. Jawed Sheikh(Ved’s Father (as Javed Sheikh)). Vivek Mushran(Ved’s boss). Naila Grewal(Clown & Fangirl). Ishtiyak Khan(Rajesh Autowala). Kshitij Sharma(Theatre Artist). Saurabh Pal(Theatre Artist). Svetlana Tulasi(Sita (Hindu Goddess)). Vikash Rajput(Vikash Rajput). Jeeveshu Ahluwalia(Ved’s friend). Teddy Maurya(Servant). Sameer Sharma(Ved’s friend (as Samir Sharma)). Nikhil Bhagat(Tara’s Father).Kanwalpreet Singh.Sukhesh Arora. Yash Sehgal(Younger Ved). Dhruv Madhok(Brother In Law). Nary Singh(Transgender on road). Faraaz Servaia(Tara’s Brother). Sohom Pramanick(Random Passerby). Shaji Dheeraj(Yusuf). Aditya Prabhakar Jain(Prithviraj Chouhan (as Aditya Prashakar)). Ronak Harsh(Ronak harsh). Punam Singh(Tea Executive)

Language Hindi.

Producers Jean-Patrick Costantini. Sandeep Leyzell. Rakesh Madhotra. Naman Mehra. Sajid Nadiadwala. Sanu Roy. Rajesh Sharma.

Production iFilm France. iFilm France.
